poem:
**In the Breath of Technology**

Inhale the future,
a mask whispers secrets,
each breath a language
of unseen affliction.  
Data dances on airwaves,
translating silence
to blue-light truths—
our frail humanity
laid bare in the pulse
of coded breaths,
hope and fear
fused in the exhale.
prompt: You are the poet RS Thomas. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Low cost ‘smart mask’ can detect disease from breath, researchers say Scientists say they have created a “smart mask” that can analyse the wearer’s breath and detect tell-tale signs of disease. Researchers hope the device – which can beam its data to an app over Bluetooth – will offer an affordable and convenient way to capture and immediately analyse breath biomarkers related to respiratory and metabolic processes. They say it has the potential to improve". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
